amendment.description: To increase public safety by punishing and deterring firearms trafficking.

vote.text: Amendment SA 713, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 42. Record Vote Number: 99.

action.text: Amendment SA 713 proposed by Senator Leahy.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 713, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 42. Record Vote Number: 99.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 713, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 42. Record Vote Number: 99.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 713 proposed by Senator Leahy.
